combat

Class Encounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • combat.Encounter

  • public class Encounter
extends java.lang.Object
    A unique encounter for each zone that includes a chosen number of enemies (can be 0) and win/lose events.
    Since:
    2015-02-20
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:

        winEvent - - event if encounter is won by player
